root.name: month()

example.code: d = day() # Values from 1 - 31 m = month() # Values from 1 - 12 y = year() # 2003, 2004, 2005, etc. println(d) println(m) println(y)

root.description: Processing communicates with the clock on your computer. The month() function returns the current month as a value from 1 - 12.
